sub_title: Senior Finance Manager EMEA at Dolby International
summary:
More than 20 years of experience in finance, accounting and control areas within the Financial Services and Telecom industry. Experience with start-up companies, managing a team of professionals, IFRS, US & Dutch GAAP, M&A, change management and implementation & roll-out of ERP software (Oracle).
I am strong in building and structuring financial departments, a strong organizer, generalist with a helicopter view but keeping an eye on detail, result oriented, can easily communicate with different levels within the organization, and have strong analytical, decisive and pragmatic skills.

Specialties: •	IFRS, US and Dutch GAAP
•	ERP software Oracle E-Business Suite and SAP
•	Actitvity Based Costing/Management (ABC / ABM) tools
•	Pricing- & cost allocation modeling experience 
•	Cost reduction projects
•	M&A
•	Downsizing and (re)building financial departments
•	Streamlining (financial) processes
•	Shared Service Center (SSC) experience
•	Transfer Pricing set-up & maintenance
•	Complex taxation experience (VAT unity, deferred   taxation, pro rate VAT-calculation)
